subject: Re: Thank you, we accepted your refinance loan request
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
 
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this tender will expire TONIGHT):
 
$486,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest entire payment!
 
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this plain form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
 
http://ouarxqrpon.com/
